Others: The match between Australia and South Africa will be played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.
The game is scheduled to kickstart at 14:00 (IST) (+5:30 GMT).
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
The match will be broadcasted live in multiple languages (English, Hindi, and Vernacular) across the Star Sports Network.
The live streaming of the match will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
